m:StandardListItem.title: Click on the CPI tenant URL to access the CPI tenant 'CPI_tenant_URL'.
In the left upper area click on 'Operations View'.
Under Manage Security click Security Material tile.
You see a list of credentials. In the right upper corner click 'Add' to add your credential artifact.
In the menu, click on 'User Credentials' to open a dialog for user credentials.
Enter in the text field 'Name' the 'GR###_CRED'.
Enter in the text field 'Description' the 'GR### - User Credentials'.
Enter in the text field 'User' the 'SFSF_User_ID'.
Enter your SFSF user password in the text field 'Password'.
Enable checkbox 'SuccessFactors'. Then a further field 'Company ID' is added to the dialog.
Enter in the text field 'Company ID' the 'SFSF_Company_ID'.
To deploy credentials artifact, click on 'Deploy'.
